email.title: Citadel - Challenge the Impossible
email.text:
Citadel is hosting an Information & Networking session on Thursday 31st Oct at Imperial!
If you're interested in learning more about the different roles in a leading trading firm and are looking to expand your career options, then come along in Lecture Theatre 201 in Skempton Building at 18:30 on the 31st.
For more information check out the attached PDF.

event.text:
The session will start with a business rep panel and then a networking session with members from Citadel's Trading, Software Engineering and Quantitative Research teams.
- Citadel is a leading investor in the world's financial markets.
- Citadel Securities is a leading quantitative trading firm and market maker.
- Careers in Trading | Quantitative Research | Software Engineering
